body_html: Thanks for the proposal, but I we're trying to keep the core fairly lean and only extend it with very popular layers and functions. I'm happy to add this if it turns out there are a few papers that successfully use this to achieve good results, and it will become more standard in the community. Until then, especially considering how simple it is to implement it yourself, let's wait and see. Hope you understand!
